title: Johnny Got His Gun - complex relationship

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Trumbo uses literary elements and techniques to portray the complex relationship between Joe and his father.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Trumbo uses literary elements and techniques to portray the complex relationship between Joe and his father.

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe how textual details reveal nuances and complexities in characters' relationships with one another.
